entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bonavista
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:19 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -7.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -12.6°C
Wind: W 32 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13 except minus 17 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 13 except minus 17 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14 except minus 10 along parts of the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain ending late in the evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the evening. Low minus 14 except minus 10 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
